paragraphs.body: Democarcy only works in certain situations. This is not one of them. Here quick decisions have to be made which cannot be done through democarcy. Understand that I am all for democracy. However I am not so blinded as to say that Democracy is the answer to ALL questions. For some places One person working for the many is needed and this is it. That is why none opposed Omni's nomination to this duty. Now, I will tell you why. It was assertained that discussing and voting for the featured article would result in massive posting. Such that cannot be accepted even with out policy of no bar for size. So the Result was that pages can be nominated but the final decision is Omni's. You could say that it is a mix of Democarcy and Monarchy. Not outright monarchy.  - Zero - Talk 16:19, 11 January 2009 (UTC)
